channel.title: Succession on sazl
channel.description: Recent content in Succession on sazl

item.title: Year of the Five Emperors
item.description: I’ve recently been interested in reading about the lives of Roman Emperors. I’m having trouble keeping things in memory so I’ve started charting out the lines of succession. Below is an example covering the Nevra-Antonine Dynasty until the end of the Severan Dynasty.
